org.jclouds.iam.features
Interface RoleApi

public interface RoleApi

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
RoleAsyncApi

Method Summary
 Role createWithPolicy(String name, String assumeRolePolicy)
          Creates a new role for your AWS account
 Role createWithPolicyAndPath(String name, String assumeRolePolicy, String path)
          like createWithPolicy(String, String), except you can specify a path.
 void delete(String name)
          Deletes the specified role.
 Role get(String name)
          Retrieves information about the specified role, including the role's path, GUID, and ARN.

          returns all roles in order.
 org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listAt(String marker)
          retrieves up to 100 roles in order, starting at marker
 org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listFirstPage()
          retrieves up to 100 roles in order.
 org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<InstanceProfile> listFirstPageOfInstanceProfiles(String name)
          retrieves up to 100 instance profiles in order for this role.
 org.jclouds.collect.PagedIterable<InstanceProfile> listInstanceProfiles(String name)
          returns all instance profiles in order for this role.
 org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<InstanceProfile> listInstanceProfilesAt(String name, String marker)
          retrieves up to 100 instance profiles in order for this role, starting at marker

          returns all roles in order at the specified pathPrefix.

          retrieves up to 100 roles in order at the specified pathPrefix.
 

Method Detail

createWithPolicy

Role createWithPolicy(String name,
                      String assumeRolePolicy)
Creates a new role for your AWS account

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to create.
assumeRolePolicy - The policy that grants an entity permission to assume the role.}
Returns:
the new role

createWithPolicyAndPath

Role createWithPolicyAndPath(String name,
                             String assumeRolePolicy,
                             String path)
like createWithPolicy(String, String), except you can specify a path.

list

org.jclouds.collect.PagedIterable<Role> list()
returns all roles in order.

listFirstPage

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listFirstPage()
retrieves up to 100 roles in order.

listAt

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listAt(String marker)
retrieves up to 100 roles in order, starting at marker

Parameters:
marker - starting point to resume the list

listPathPrefix

org.jclouds.collect.PagedIterable<Role> listPathPrefix(String pathPrefix)
returns all roles in order at the specified pathPrefix.

Parameters:
pathPrefix - ex. /division_abc/subdivision_xyz/

listPathPrefixFirstPage

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listPathPrefixFirstPage(String pathPrefix)
retrieves up to 100 roles in order at the specified pathPrefix.

Parameters:
pathPrefix - ex. /division_abc/subdivision_xyz/

listPathPrefixAt

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<Role> listPathPrefixAt(String pathPrefix,
                                                              String marker)
retrieves up to 100 roles in order at the specified pathPrefix, starting at marker.

Parameters:
pathPrefix - ex. /division_abc/subdivision_xyz/
marker - starting point to resume the list

get

@Nullable
Role get(String name)
Retrieves information about the specified role, including the role's path, GUID, and ARN.

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to get information about.
Returns:
null if not found

listInstanceProfiles

org.jclouds.collect.PagedIterable<InstanceProfile> listInstanceProfiles(String name)
returns all instance profiles in order for this role.

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to get instance profiles for.

listFirstPageOfInstanceProfiles

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<InstanceProfile> listFirstPageOfInstanceProfiles(String name)
retrieves up to 100 instance profiles in order for this role.

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to get instance profiles for.

listInstanceProfilesAt

org.jclouds.collect.IterableWithMarker<InstanceProfile> listInstanceProfilesAt(String name,
                                                                               String marker)
retrieves up to 100 instance profiles in order for this role, starting at marker

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to get instance profiles for.
marker - starting point to resume the list

delete

void delete(String name)
Deletes the specified role. The role must not have any policies attached.

Parameters:
name - Name of the role to delete
